channel.title: KethiumX - #317 Economy Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/30uy39g.png[/img]
KethiumX is a Economy based server. Our non-combat & Combat Skills are flawless, it is not difficult nor easy! KethiumX is a server that has friendly players, we have a small player base right now, but we hope that we will grow and grow. Our development team is open to any suggestions our players come with. We will make sure to be as much active as possible and to have the server updated with some cool features!
Forums - [url=http://kethiumx.netii.net/]http://kethiumx.netii.net/[/url] Downloadable Client - [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66038819/Client.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/66038819/Client.jar[/url]
[B]What does KethiumX have to offer?[/B] (First of all, All skills are working.)
[B]We have lots of Bosses such as;[/B]
Godwars Dungeon. King Black Dragon. Dagganoths. Giant Roc. Kalphite Queen. Chaos Elemental Slash Back. Ice Queen. mutant Tarn. Sea Troll Queen. Barrelchest. The inadequacy.
[B]We also have many Minigames such as;[/B]
Barbarian Assault. Barrows. Warrios Guild. Soul Wars. Castle Wars. Fishing Trawler. Pest Control. Tzhaar Caves. Duel Arena. Ranging Guild.
[B]Other Features:[/B]
Fishing Random Event. Woodcutting Random Event. Fully Working Clan chat + Setup. Custom Treasure Trails. Lock/Unlock Experience. Reset Skills with Interfaces. Make Over Mage. Bones On Altar. All Altars. Player Killing Flawless Combat.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LpdFe5p96nQ&feature=youtu.be
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2ep6f46.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/1111hfp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/1111hfp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/1zz75s7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/264tgef.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2rgezit.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/a27y3t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/33jso7p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/155jthg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2d7io28.png[/img]

item.title: KethiumX - #317 Economy Server
item.dc:creator: @kethiumx kethiumx
item.description:
@kethiumx wrote:

imthenull:

cool… i don’t know of many servers that release the source of their client in the distribution :\

we fixed that sorry
[[quote=“Revamp dis Shit, post:2, topic:543493”]Now I know you didn’t take a Krithium base and rename it Kethium… because that would be embarrassing…

Anyways, gl with this…let’s see where it goes.[/quote]

well i didnt know there was a source with that name

Read full topic

[CENTER]

KethiumX is a Economy based server. Our non-combat & Combat Skills are flawless, it is not difficult nor easy!
KethiumX is a server that has friendly players, we have a small player base right now, but we hope that we will grow and grow.
Our development team is open to any suggestions our players come with. We will make sure to be as much active as possible
